Khayaal tark-e-muhabbat bajaa sahi lekin,
Huyi na yuun bhi hamari guzzar to kya ho ga..

Ab tak khabar na thi ke mohabbat gunnah hai,
Ab jaan kar gunaah kiye jaa raha hoon main..

Mujh sa koi jahan main nadaan bhi na ho,
Kar ke jo ishq kehta hai nuqsaan bhi na ho..

Main yeh kis ke naam likhoon jo alam guzr rahe hain,
Mer shehr jal rahe hain mere log mar rahe hain,
Koi ghuncha ho ke gul ho koi shaakh ho shajar ho,
Woh havaa-e-gulistaaan hai ke sabhi bikhar rahe hain,
Kabhi rehmaten thiin naazil isi khitta-e-zameen pr,
Wohi khitta-e-zameen hai ke azaab utar rahe hain,
Wohi taayeron ke jhurmatt jo havaa main jhoolte thay,
Woh fazaa ko dekhte hain to ab aaah bhar rahe hain,
Barri aarzuu thi hum ko naye khawb dekhne ki,
So ab apni zindagi main naye khawb bhar rahe hain,
Koi aur to nahin hai pas-e-khanjjar-azmaayi,
Hameen qatal ho rahe hain hameen qatal kar rahe hain..

Khaak thi aur jism-o-jaan kehte rahe,
Channd eeentton ko makaan kehte rahe..

Jiss ke naseeb main hon zamane ki thokrain,
Us badnaseeb se na sahaaron ki baat kar..

Tujh ko paanay ki aarzu karna,
Aandhiyon main diya jalaana tha..

Baar-haa iss saadgi pe khud hanssi aayi mujhe,
Kar raha hoon kis zamaane mein wafaa ki baat..

Jalwon ki sazishon ko na rakho hijab mein,
Ye bijliyaan hein ruk na saken gi naqaab mein!

Khushbuu to saans lene ko thehri raah mein,
Hum bd-gumaan aise ke ghar ko palatt gaye..
